title: The Garden designers
brief_description: An interesting collection of creative ideas for home gardeners presented in a practical manner, using the expertise of international garden designers. The video illustrates clearly the step by step construction of a number of garden features including laying paving stones, steps and terracing, providing shade, constructing walls, small garden pools and creating patio gardens. Rated: G
